1. Press the "Toedok" button to create a chat room.
2. Enter the conversation between you and the other person.
3. Squirrel will send your refined message.
The app will restart shortly after changing the language.

대화의 전반적인 흐름과\n상태를 균형 있게 분석하여\n개선점을 제안합니다:
Analyzes the overall flow and
state of the conversation
in a balanced way to suggest improvements.
In-depth analysis of the potential
to develop into a romantic relationship
and signs of affection.
Analyzes emotional flow and
opportunities to increase
closeness with the other person.
Detects signs of disconnection
and analyzes the conversation
toward ending the relationship.
Analyzes the context of
misunderstandings in the conversation
and suggests solutions.
Neutrally analyzes the current
flow and atmosphere of the conversation
to assess the situation.
